title: Huoli Shaonian Wang 3: Xuji
alternative_title: Blazing Teens 4, Blazing Teens 3: Sequel, Huoli Shaonian Wang 3: Di 2 Ji, 火力少年王3续集
description: A 26-episode second season sequel to Huoli Shaonian Wang 3. It aired 2 years after the original and focuses on the Blazing Team in a global competition against teams of other nations.
